title: Tarar grieved over demise of Muhammad Irfan’s father
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 15 (APP): Federal Minister for Information, Broadcasting, National Heritage and Culture Attaullah Tarar on Wednesday expressed deep grief over the demise of the father of Muhammad Irfan, Pakistani Press Counselor in Saudi Arabia.
The minister, in a news statement, expressed heartfelt condolences and sympathy to Muhammad Irfan and other family members over the loss.
Tarar, who was deeply saddened to hear the news of the death of Muhammad Irfan’s father, called it a tragedy for the bereaved family.
The void created by father’s death will never be filled, he added.
The minister prayed to Almighty to rest the departed soul in the eternal peace, and grant courage to the bereaved family to bear the loss with fortitude.
